channel.title: Making server 24/7 help!
channel.description:

java.mysql.php - Load jdk - Transform .rtf (.php) ping to server 550.140.669
and preaty much i need help with the whole thing...if someone could explain more specific...thats

item.title: Making server 24/7 help!
item.dc:creator: @i_make_servers i make servers
item.description:
@i_make_servers wrote:

Well…when i try to put it into the sql database in fr33webhost.com it says in valid characters or somethen.

Read full topic

item.title: Making server 24/7 help!
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

THE BASICS

MySQL is a system for loading and saving data. The very forum you are looking at
is using MySQL.

Now all you need is to create a new notepad file. And add this:
java.mysql.php - Load jdk - Transform .rtf (.php) ping to server 550.140.669

This will make all the files into PHP for MYSQL.

Read full topic

item.description:
